title: Which one is best among the iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, and iPhone 11 Pro Max? - Quora

response.answer_text: Which iPhone will give you the most bang for your buck iPhone 11 iPhone 11 Pro or iPhone 11 Pro Max? The best value for your dollar is iPhone 11 The iPhone 11 is the best value iPhone Apple has ever made they managed to add a Ultra wide camera with HUGEEEE improvements over the Xr, Added better water resistance, A hugely better selfie cam (You can now record better video on the selfie camera of the iPhone 11 then the $100 more expensive Pixel 4’s back camera ), Fastest CPU GPU In any smartphone, One Gigabyte more Ram, an Ultra Wideband chip for spatial awareness, Better battery, Spatial audio playback and Dolby Atmos support All while lowering the price by 50 bucks that to me is incredible and shows a new direction inside of Apple where there finally listening to consumers these things will sell like hot cakes

The specs of all three phones, the iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro and the iPhone 11 Pro Max are nearly the same. No matter which one you get, you will have almost the same experience. Get iPhone 11 if you do not want to destroy your bank. Its size is good, specs and features are also good and it is cheap. iPhone 11 Pro has the triple camera and is expensive (US $1,099) than the iPhone 11 with all the similar specs. iPhone 11 Pro Max is the bigger one with the matt finish. Get this model if you have the budget and if you want all the specs one notch higher. It is the most expensive one (64 GB variant for $1,099, 256 GB variant $1,249 and 512 GB variant $1,449).
